response.overview: On Tuesday May 4 2021, “Spiritual Punishment” premiered on YouTube. A 35 minute long piece of sonic terror and at the same time the very first time that Doodseskader brings a full set live. MMXX : Year Zero was released about half a year ago and is already at its second pressing! The stream is a “thank you” for the massive support they received the past months. Directed by Johan-Jacob Verscheure a.k.a. Jean-Jacques DuCraque, the same person who put their music videos together, the visual terror will be ever present yet again to bring live to Doodseskader in all its glory.
response.title: Doodseskader: Spiritual Punishment
